Class QuizService

java.lang.Object
com.github.ilim.backend.service.QuizService
@Service public class QuizService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing quizzes within courses.

Provides functionalities such as creating, updating, retrieving, and deleting quizzes, as well as managing associated questions and options.

See Also:
  • QuizRepo
  • CourseService
  • ModuleService

  • Constructor Details

    • QuizService

      public QuizService()

  • Method Details

    • findQuizById

      public Quiz findQuizById(User user, UUID quizId)
      Retrieves a quiz by its unique identifier, ensuring the user has access to its content.
      Parameters:
      user - the User entity requesting the quiz
      quizId - the unique identifier of the quiz
      Returns:
      the Quiz entity corresponding to the provided ID
      Throws:
      QuizNotFoundException - if no quiz is found with the given ID
      NotCourseInstructorException - if the user does not have access to the quiz content

    • findQuizByIdAsInstructor

      public Quiz findQuizByIdAsInstructor(User instructor, UUID quizId)
      Retrieves a quiz by its unique identifier as an instructor, ensuring the instructor is authorized.
      Parameters:
      instructor - the User entity representing the instructor
      quizId - the unique identifier of the quiz
      Returns:
      the Quiz entity corresponding to the provided ID
      Throws:
      QuizNotFoundException - if no quiz is found with the given ID
      NotCourseInstructorException - if the user is not the instructor of the course

    • getQuizDtoByQuizId

      public QuizDto getQuizDtoByQuizId(User instructor, UUID quizId)
      Retrieves a QuizDto representation of a quiz by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      instructor - the User entity representing the instructor
      quizId - the unique identifier of the quiz
      Returns:
      a QuizDto containing quiz details
      Throws:
      QuizNotFoundException - if no quiz is found with the given ID
      NotCourseInstructorException - if the user is not the instructor of the course

    • addQuizToModule

      public void addQuizToModule(User instructor, UUID moduleId, QuizDto dto)
      Adds a new quiz to a specified module.

      Creates a new Quiz entity from the provided QuizDto, associates it with the module, saves the quiz and its questions and options, and updates the module's items.

      Parameters:
      instructor - the User entity representing the instructor adding the quiz
      moduleId - the unique identifier of the module to which the quiz will be added
      dto - the data transfer object containing quiz details

    • updateQuiz

      public void updateQuiz(User instructor, UUID quizId, @Valid @Valid QuizDto dto)
      Updates an existing quiz with new details.

      Clears existing questions, updates the quiz based on the provided QuizDto, saves the updated quiz, and persists the new questions and options.

      Parameters:
      instructor - the User entity representing the instructor updating the quiz
      quizId - the unique identifier of the quiz to be updated
      dto - the data transfer object containing updated quiz details

    • removeQuizFromModule

      public void removeQuizFromModule(User instructor, UUID quizId)
      Removes a quiz from its associated module.

      Checks for existing quiz attempts before deletion. If no attempts exist, removes the quiz from the module and deletes the quiz record.

      Parameters:
      instructor - the User entity representing the instructor deleting the quiz
      quizId - the unique identifier of the quiz to be removed
      Throws:
      CantDeleteAttemptedQuizException - if there are existing attempts for the quiz
      NotCourseInstructorException - if the user is not the instructor of the course
